name: Controlled Together
description:
Play as two dinosaurs who want to be together. But there is a problem their controls are joined together. You control both of them at the same time. Try and complete all 5 levels in the game by navigating the terrain and making the dinosaurs touch so at last they can be together.

This is one of my first attempts at creating a game in just over 24 hours.

This game is quite short and will only take you a minute or two to complete

This game was created in just over one day for the GMTK 2021 game jam. 

Game designer + resource gatherer Gulag Games

Programmer + game creator Ellisjames20061

Music and sound designer Fedelecuo

Character art -  @ScissorMarks
